successes.title: TOUCH TIME: Digital Watch with Touch Screen
successes.description: Next generation digital watch with a touch screen, Smartphone-like watch apps, "always on" display, and you never need to charge it.

Pledges.description: Thanks for your support and we look forward to you joining us as we provide updates on our journey to bringing this new watch to market later this year.
Phosphor T-Shirt: Get Phosphor branded T-Shirt and help spread the word. Free US shipping included add  $15 to ship internationally.

FIRST BACKERS act fast! The first 200 stainless steel case with black silicone strap watches off the assembly line are available at great price of $89. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

The Touch Time watch with stainless steel case and black silicone strap is expected to be the most popular and will retail for $159, but Kickstarter backers get the stainless steel case black silicone version now for just $99. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

Select a Touch Time watch that features a stainless steel metal case and a colored silicone strap version, expected retail of $159. Your choice of color strap version: white, orange, light blue, or pink. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

Select a Touch Time watch that features a stainless steel metal case and a strap made of seatbelt webbing material, expected retail of $179. Your choice of color strap version: orange or black. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.
For those with higher end tastes you will receive silver stainless bracelet version, regular priced $199, yours just $149.Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

For those with higher end tastes you can also choose to get the gunmetal black stainless steel bracelet version, regular priced $209, yours just $159. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.
Receive a Touch Time watch with stainless steel case and mesh metal band, expected retail of $210. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

Limited Edition Kickstarter Green – Receive a serially engraved gunmetal black stainless steel case with our logo and home dot in Kickstarter green and black silicone strap. Available to the first 500 backers. Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.

Select any TWO Touch Time watches that feature a stainless steel metal case and a colored silicone strap, expected retail value of $318. Your choice of any color silicone strap version available: white, orange, light blue, pink, AND black . Free US shipping included, add $35 to ship internationally. After the project ends we will follow up with you to determine which two silicone color versions you would like to receive.

Select any TWO Touch Time watches that feature a stainless steel metal case and any colored silicone strap and any bracelet version, expected retail value of $350 or more. Your choice of any color silicone strap available: white, orange, light blue, pink, OR black, and either bracelet version: gunmetal black or silver stainless steel. Free US shipping included, add $35 to ship internationally. After the project ends we will follow up with you to determine which versions you would like to receive.

Select any THREE Touch Time watches that feature a stainless steel metal case and a colored silicone strap, expected retail value of $475. Your choice of any color silicone strap version available: white, orange, light blue, pink, OR black. Free US shipping included, add $35 to ship internationally. After the project ends we will follow up with you to determine which three silicone color versions you would like to receive.

Select any TWO Touch Time watches that feature a stainless steel metal case and any bracelet version, expected retail value of $398 or more. Your choice of either bracelet version: the gunmetal black or silver stainless steel. Free US shipping included, add $35 to ship internationally. After the project ends we will follow up with you to determine which bracelet versions you would like to receive.

Get the Kickstarter Limited Edition version, an 18K gold-dipped case with black silicone strap, and serially engraved case. The only 200 pieces ever to be made! Free US shipping included, add $25 to ship internationally.
For top backers get all 7 styles. Give one to everyone in your family or in your office. Free US shipping included, add $50 to ship internationally.

Collector’s Edition – Select any 10 stainless steel case and silicone strap versions of your choice, including the Kickstarter Ltd Edition version. Choose from silicone strap colors: white, black, orange, light blue, and pink. Free US shipping included add $100 to ship internationally.
